import * as React from 'react'; import './index.scss'; const Modal = (props) => { const { close, difficulty, setDifficulty, visible } = props; const [page, setPage] = React.useState(0); const [difficultySetting, setDifficultySetting] = React.useState(difficulty); const [customHeight, setCustomHeight] = React.useState(9); const [customWidth, setCustomWidth] = React.useState(9); const [customMines, setCustomMines] = React.useState(10); React.useEffect(() => { setDifficulty(difficultySetting); }, [difficultySetting, setDifficulty]) return visible && ( <>

Minesweeper Menu

{page === 0 && (
Height Width Mines
setDifficultySetting('beginner')} /> Beginner 9 9 10
setDifficultySetting('intermediate')} /> Intermediate 16 16 40
setDifficultySetting('expert')} /> Expert 16 30 99
setDifficultySetting('custom')} /> Custom e.target.value <= 25 ? setCustomHeight(e.target.value) : setCustomHeight(25)} type="number" value={customHeight} /> e.target.value <= 50 ? setCustomWidth(e.target.value) : setCustomWidth(50)} type="number" value={customWidth} /> e.target.value <= customHeight * customWidth - 1 ? setCustomMines(e.target.value) : setCustomMines(customHeight * customWidth - 1)} type="number" value={customMines} />
)}
); } export default Modal;
